name: Archery Ace - The Archery King Edtion
name_original: Archery Ace - The Archery King Edtion
description:
It’s a very interesting archery game. Simulating the popular archery games nowadays. By easy clicking and moving could control bow and arrow to shot target.

Control arrow precisely to shoot target accurately. Through the practice again and again, you will get higher and higher score and own full sense of accomplishment.

Hurry up, invite your friends to complete who is the winner.
